                    <script>
                        $('#support-menu-button').on('click', function () {
                            $('#support-menu').dialog({
                                resizable: false,
                                autoOpen: true,
                                draggable: false,
                                dialogClass: 'support_dialog',
                                modal: true,
                                width: 295,
                                open: function(event, ui) {
                                    setTimeout(function() { $('#supportSearchTerm').focus(); }, 1);
                                    $('.support-close-link').click(function(event) {
                                      $('#support-menu').dialog('close'); 
                                    });
                                    //close if click anywhere outside the dialog box
                                    $('.ui-widget-overlay').click(function (event) {
                                        event.preventDefault();
                                        $('#support-menu').dialog('close');
                                    });
                                },
                                position: {
                                    my: 'right top',
                                    at: 'right bottom',
                                    of: $('#support-menu-button')
                                }
                            });

                            var timerid;
                            $(window).resize(function () {
                                (timerid && clearTimeout(timerid));
                                timerid = setTimeout(function () {
                                    $("#support-menu").dialog("option", "position", {
                                        my: 'right top',
                                        at: 'right bottom',
                                        of: $('#support-menu-button')
                                    });
                                });
                            });
                            return false;
                        });
                    </script>
                </li>
            </ul>

                        <label class="quick-search-label-checkradio selectByDateLabel" for="house-communications-dateOperator">Date</label>

                        <div class="cdg-datepicker" id="house-communications-startDate"><input type="text" name="startDate" placeholder="mm/dd/yyyy" class="auto-width selectByDate cdg-datepicker-input hasDatepicker" value="" id="dp1653057344215"><button type="button" class="ui-datepicker-trigger"><span>Select Date</span></button></div>
                        <span id="house-communications-dateAnd" style="display: none;">and</span>

                </fieldset>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="quick-search-form-row">
                <fieldset class="quick-search-fieldset">
                    <legend class="quick-search-legend">Congressional Record Date</legend>
                    <div class="quick-search-form-flex-row">
                        <label class="quick-search-label-checkradio selectByDateLabel" for="senate-communications-dateOperator">Date</label>
                        <select id="senate-communications-dateOperator" name="dateOperator" class="auto-width">
                        <option value="equal" selected="selected">is equal to</option><option value="between">is between</option><option value="after">is after</option><option value="before">is before</option><option value="is">is</option>                        </select>
                        <div class="cdg-datepicker" id="senate-communications-startDate"><input type="text" name="startDate" placeholder="mm/dd/yyyy" class="auto-width selectByDate cdg-datepicker-input hasDatepicker" value="" id="dp1653057344217"><button type="button" class="ui-datepicker-trigger"><span>Select Date</span></button></div>

                </fieldset>

    	<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() {
		    // search focus
    		$('#search_main input[id=search]').focus();

    		// header
    		$('.nav-links-main').clone().removeClass('nav-links nav-links-main').addClass('nav-links-clone nav-links-clone-main').prependTo('nav.nav-links-clone-wrapper');
    		$('.nav-links-tertiary .tertiary').clone().removeClass('nav-links nav-links-tertiary').addClass('nav-links-clone').appendTo('.nav-links-clone');
    		$('html').click(function() {
				$('.nav-links-clone-wrapper').slideUp();
				$('.nav-links-toggle').removeClass('active').attr('aria-expanded', 'false');
			});
			$('.nav-links-toggle, .tertiary-more-toggle').click(function(event){
				event.stopPropagation();
			});
	    	$('.nav-links-toggle').click(function() {
	    		if($('.nav-links-clone-wrapper').is(':hidden')) {
	    			$('.nav-links-clone-wrapper').slideDown();
	    			$('.nav-links-toggle').addClass('active').attr('aria-expanded', 'true');
	    		} else {
	    			$('.nav-links-clone-wrapper').slideUp();
	    			$('.nav-links-toggle').removeClass('active').attr('aria-expanded', 'false');
	    		}
	    	});
	    	$(window).on("load resize scroll",function(e){
	    		$('.nav-links-clone-wrapper').hide();
				$('.nav-links-toggle').removeClass('active').attr('aria-expanded', 'false');
	    	});
		    $('.h_account').tooltip();
		});
	</script>

                <div class="saved-search-bar" id="saved-search-bar">
    <a href="#" class="save-this-search" id="saveThisSearch">Save this Search</a>        <span style="display:none;">
            | <a href="#" id="savedSearches">Your Saved Searches</a>

        <div id="saveThisSearchDialog" style="display:none;">
        You must <a id="saveThisSearchDialog-signinlink" href="/account/signin">sign in</a>
        or <a id="saveThisSearchDialog-createaccountlinklink" href="/account/register">create an account</a>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $('#saveThisSearch').on('click', function (event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            var uri;

            window.location.hash = undefined;

            if (window.location.search) {
                uri = window.location.pathname + window.location.search + '&dosavesearch=true'
            } else {
                uri = window.location.pathname + window.location.search + '?dosavesearch=true';
            }
            $.cookie("post-authentication-url", uri, { path: '/', secure: (window.location.protocol === 'https:') });
            // cdg-8584
            $('#saveThisSearchDialog-signinlink').attr(
                'href',
                '/account/signin'
             );


            $('#saveThisSearchDialog-createaccountlinklink').attr(
                'href',
                '/account/register?postloginpage=' +
                     encodeURIComponent(uri)
            );

            $('#saveThisSearchDialog').dialog({
                autoOpen: true,
                dialogClass: 'congress_dialog congress-default-modal',
                title: 'To save this search:',
                modal: true,
                open: function (event, ui) {
                    $('.ui-widget-overlay').off('click').on('click', function () {
                        $('#saveThisSearchDialog').dialog('close');
                    });

                    $('#saveThisSearchDialog .dialog-close').off('click').on('click', function (e) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        $('#saveThisSearchDialog').dialog('close');
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    </script>

    <span class="result-title">A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that in order to effectively address the high prevalence of individuals suffering from mental <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> conditions and substance use disorders, the United States needs to make historic financial investments into mental <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> and substance use disorder <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> and finally acknowledge such <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> as a priority in <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> equal to physical <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark>, and for other purposes.</span>

            <strong>Sponsor:</strong> <a target="_blank" href="/member/raphael-warnock/W000790?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D">Sen. Warnock, Raphael G.     <span class="result-title">Recognizing women's cardiovascular <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> as a critical <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> priority that affects every State and contributes to increased <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> costs, and promoting the necessity of increased awareness of and education on the symptoms for heart disease among women, gender-specific cardiovascular disease research, and policy action to alleviate the risks of heart disease among women.</span>

    8.
    <span class="result-heading"><a href="/bill/117th-congress/house-resolution/568?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D&amp;s=1&amp;r=8">H.Res.568</a> ¡ª 117th Congress (2021-2022)</span>
    <span class="result-title">Expressing that the United States is obligated to permanently end the unhoused crisis by 2025 and uphold, protect, and enforce the civil and human rights of unhoused individuals, including the human rights to housing, universal <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark>, livable wages, education, employment opportunities, access to public facilities, free movement in public spaces, privacy, confidentiality, internet access, vote, freedom from harassment by law enforcement, private businesses, property owners, and housed residents, and equal rights to <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark>, legal representation, and social services without discrimination based on housing status.</span>
                    <span class="result-item">
            <strong>Sponsor:</strong> <a target="_blank" href="/member/cori-bush/B001224?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D">Rep. Bush, Cori [D-MO-1]</a> (Introduced 07/28/2021) <strong>Cosponsors:</strong> (<a href="/bill/117th-congress/house-resolution/568/cosponsors?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D&amp;s=1&amp;r=8&amp;overview=closed#tabs">30</a>)        </span>

    9.
    <span class="result-heading"><a href="/bill/117th-congress/house-resolution/274?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D&amp;s=1&amp;r=9">H.Res.274</a> ¡ª 117th Congress (2021-2022)</span>
    <span class="result-title">Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 619) to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit a <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> practitioner from failing to exercise the proper degree of <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> in the case of a child who survives an abortion or attempted abortion.</span>

    12.
    <span class="result-heading"><a href="/bill/117th-congress/house-resolution/838?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22health+care%22%2C%22health%22%2C%22care%22%5D%7D&amp;s=1&amp;r=12">H.Res.838</a> ¡ª 117th Congress (2021-2022)</span>
    <span class="result-title">Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5314) to protect our democracy by preventing abuses of presidential power, restoring checks and balances and accountability and transparency in government, and defending elections against foreign interference, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1605) to designate the National Pulse Memorial located at 1912 South Orange Avenue in Orlando, Florida, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (S. 610) to address behavioral <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> and well-being among <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">health</mark> <mark data-markjs="true" class="searchterm-highlight">care</mark> professionals.</span>

    <div class="top-link">
        <a href="#" id="sticky-back-to-top" style="display: none;"><i></i><span>Back to top</span></a>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        var scroll_timer,
            displayed = false,
            $message = $('.top-link a').hide(),
            $window = $(window),
            top = $(document.body).children(0).position().top;

        $("#sticky-back-to-top").click(function(event){
            $window.scrollTop(0);
            event.preventDefault();
            return false;
        });

        $window.scroll(function () {
            window.clearTimeout(scroll_timer);
            scroll_timer = window.setTimeout(function () {
                if($window.scrollTop() <= top){
                    displayed = false;
                    $message.fadeOut(800);
                }else if(displayed == false){
                    displayed = true;
                    $message.stop(true, true).show().click(function () { $message.fadeOut(800); });
                }
            }, 100);
        });
    });
    </script>

    </div><div id="ui-datepicker-div" class="ui-datepicker ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-helper-clearfix ui-corner-all"></div>

        <span class="sr-only">Loading...</span>

    <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        // Display system alert if not empty, suppress borwser support warning if present
        if ($('#system_alert').is(':not(:empty)')) {
            $('#system_alert').removeAttr("style").prepend('<span class="hide_fromsighted">Alert: </span>');
            $('#browser_support_alert').attr("style","display:none");
        }

        var h = window.location.hash,
            scrollTo = 0;

        if (h) {
            if ($(h).offset() !== undefined) {
                scrollTo = $(h).offset().top;
            }
        }

        if (scrollTo > 0) {
            $('html, body').stop().animate({ scrollTop : scrollTo + "px"}, 0);
        }

        $('body').congress_LAC({ checkUrl: '/lac/check' });
    });
    </script>
